title: Function Call
description: Function call with its list of arguments. Can represent the entry point into a function call graph or be a node in such a graph.

module.description: The ID of the containing module. If a built-in function is specified then the referenced module **MUST** the empty string.

functionName.description: The unqualified name of the function.

type.description: The return type of the function.

arguments.description: A list of named value and/or function call arguments.
